column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A Chinese woman was seriously injured when speeding car crashes Walk on the sidewalk. The driver was identified by witnesses at the scene as a young woman
column4: but she fled the scene.------The incident happened at 2:00 AM on August 9
column5: 2020. Located along Northbridge Road in front of a Chinese shop
column6: around 100 meters south of Phsar Dei Huy flyover In Sangkat Teuk Thla
